snippet.title: The Happy Hills Homicide Tape 1-10 Gameplay | No Commentary
snippet.description:
Welcome to Happyhills, the place where you can indulge your deepest desires, make your wildest dreams come true, and slaughter anyone in any way you want. In this case, all three of these are the same.
Game Link:
https://gamejolt.com/games/thehappyhillshomicide/570127

Play as a stylish 80's style slasher and kill your way through different levels. Remember: professionals have standards, kill every target in an unique way, and do not get caught, spoils the fun.

This game is an early access project. So far there are 10 levels for you to try. I may add new levels in the future if you would like me to.

Extract the files in the zip and use the .exe to play!

WARNING: The game contains very violent and disturbing cartoon images.

► Leave a Like if you enjoyed the video. It will help the channel grow also. Don't hesitate to leave a comment. I love hearing from you guys; positive or negative is all good.
